name: Otto Bots
description:
Note: This game is still in development.

- How to Play -

This is a two-player game only. There is currently no single-player mode. Both players will play on the same screen.

For best experience using gamepads is recommended.

Keyboard Controls:

- WASD  =  Move Cursor

- Enter  =  Select

- Arrow Keys  =  Rotate Camera

- Plus/Minus  =  Zoom Camera In/Out

- Q/E  =  Select Unit Type to Spawn

- Space Bar  =  Spawn Unit/Send Unit to Island

- ESC  =  Pause

Mouse Controls:

- Move Mouse  =  Move Cursor

- Left Click  =  Select

- Hold Right Click While Moving Mouse  =  Rotate Camera

- Hold Middle Click While Moving Mouse  =  Zoom Camera In/Out

- Scroll  =  Select Unit Type to Spawn

- Middle Click  =  Spawn Unit/Send Unit to Island

Gamepad Controls:

- Left Stick  =  Move Cursor

- South Button  =  Select

- Right Stick  =  Rotate Camera

- L2/R2  =  Zoom Camera In/Out

- L1/R1  =  Select Unit Type to Spawn

- North Button  =  Spawn Unit/Send Unit to Island

- Start  =  Pause

- Credits -
